articles.title: Brazilian expats in Australia look for change as nation goes to the polls - ABC News
articles.description: Thais Orban, Sonia Coimbra and Pedro Mello say they had to leave their country when Jair Bolsonaro was elected as president of Brazil in 2018. On Sunday, they will have the chance to vote against Bolsonaro in the country's presidential election.
